name: Pasha Kostohrys
description: I’m a Back-End developer (TL) at Codefresh. Specializing in Docker, Helm, Kubernetes, and other related things. Leading the CD direction at Codefresh. Really happy to see how my team and I are solving problems on how customer delivery flows use the technologies that we are creating.
